src:
Keeperkaos for City: M√•tte bruke utespiller i m√•l
Dramatikk da Manchester City fikk med seg ett poeng i Champions League-kampen mot Atalanta.
06 Nov 2019, 21:57 by Lars S√∏rnes

Atalanta - Manchester City 1‚Äì1 (0‚Äì1)

Det er ikke resultatet det snakkes om etter onsdagens oppgj√∏r. Manchester City m√•tte spille de siste minuttene med Kyle Walker mellom stengene.

‚Äì Kyle Walker m√• v√¶re verdens raskeste keeper. Han holdt buret rent, sa TV 2-programleder Jon Hartvig B√∏rrestad etter kampen.


Real Madrids stortalent (18) herjet - ble historisk i brakseier


Fakta: Champions League menn onsdag, gruppespillet 4. runde:


Gruppe A:


Paris Saint-Germain (Frankrike) ‚Äì Brugge (Belgia) 1-0 (1-0), Real Madrid (Spania) ‚Äì Galatasaray (Tyrkia) 6-0 (4-0).


Gruppe B:


Bayern M√ºnchen (Tyskland) ‚Äì Olympiakos (Hellas) 2-0 (1-0), R√∏de Stjerne (Serbia) ‚Äì Tottenham (England) 0-4 (0-1).


Gruppe C:


Atalanta (Italia) ‚Äì Manchester C. (England) 1-1 (0-1), Dinamo Zagreb (Kroatia) ‚Äì Sjakhtar Donetsk (Ukraina) 3-3 (1-1).


Gruppe D:


Lokomotiv Moskva (Russland) ‚Äì Juventus (Italia) 1-2 (1-1), Leverkusen (Tyskland) ‚Äì Atl√©tico Madrid (Spania) 2-1 (1-0).

Erstatteren ble utvist
La oss begynne litt tidligere. F√∏rstekeeperen Ederson m√•tte gi seg med det som s√• ut som en skade. Claudio Bravo kom inn for de lysebl√• etter pause.
Ti minutter f√∏r kampslutt ble erstatteren utvist. Bravo felte Atalantas Josip Ilicic som var p√• tur alene gjennom. Etter en VAR-sjekk tok dommeren fram det r√∏de kortet.
Manager Pep Guardiola kastet inn Kyle Walker i sluttminuttene. Den vanligvis solide h√∏yrebacken, som i denne kampen satt p√• innbytterbenken, avsluttet kampen i m√•let med keeperhanskene p√•.
Walker reddet frisparket som oppsto etter utvisningen, men ble ellers ikke satt p√• de store pr√∏vene.

‚Äì Om jeg meldte meg frivillig? Det var b√•de og. Jeg slenger med leppa til keeperne p√• trening noen ganger, men jeg fant ut at det ikke er s√• lett som det ser ut, sa Walker if√∏lge BBC.

Det ble lagt til sju minutter etter at nesten s√• mye forsvant i forbindelse med utvisningen, men hjemmelaget evnet ikke √• utnytte overtaket.
TV 2s fotballekspert, Erik Thorstvedt, oppsummerte Walkers innsats med en humoristisk analyse i studioet etter uavgjortkampen.
‚Äì Han dekker alle deler av keeperspillet. Han finner p√• noe nytt og tar vare p√• det tradisjonelle, sa Thorstvedt.

Stjernespiss opp i ryggen p√• Haaland etter ny scoring



Kyle Walker holdt buret rent i hektiske sluttminutter.üì∑ Luca Bruno / AP

Overlegent
Med 1-1 er Pep Guardiolas menn fortsatt ikke sikre p√• avansement fra gruppespillet, selv om de har fem poengs luke p√• tabelltopp med to runder igjen. Med seier p√• San Siro onsdag ville City allerede v√¶rt gruppevinner, og ved pause tydet alt p√• det det kom til √• bli tre poeng.
Bergamo-laget Atalanta, som i sin f√∏rste mesterligadeltakelse m√• spille hjemmekampene i Milano, var poengl√∏s etter de tre f√∏rste kampene og ble i perioder rundspilt av City i f√∏rste omgang.
Det var klasseforskjell da laget tok ledelsen i det 7. minutt. Raheem Sterling spilte til Bernardo Silva, som fant Gabriel Jesus p√• l√∏p i feltet. Han h√¶lsparket ballen til Sterling, som kunne score fra kort hold. Hjemmeforsvaret var totalt utspilt.

Nedtur for Arsenal - seieren glapp p√• overtid

Premier League-mesteren virket overlegen i den f√∏rste omgangen og truet stadig med √• score flere m√•l. Det burde blitt 2-0 noen minutter f√∏r pause, men Gabriel Jesus sendte et straffespark svakt til side for m√•l.


Walker holdt nullen for City.üì∑ CARL RECINE / Reuters


Barcelona snublet i Champions League

VAR-drama
F√∏rst ble det d√∏mt straffe da Rafael Toloi holdt igjen Sterling p√• vei inn i feltet, men VAR grep inn og slo fast at forseelsen var utenfor 16-meteren. Sterling tok frisparket, som traff h√•nden til Josip Ilcic i muren. Etter at dommeren hadde v√¶rt ute ved VAR-skjermen ble det straffe, men Jesus sl√∏ste den bort.
I det 49. minutt straffet det seg da Atalanta-kaptein Alejandro G√≥mez ble sendt i fullt firsprang nedover venstrekanten av Jos√© Luis Palominos langpasning fra egen halvdel. Han skrudde ballen inn i feltet, og der kunne en helt ensom Mario Pasalic stange den i m√•l.
Nesten det f√∏rste Claudio Bravo gjorde i kampen var dermed √• plukke ballen ut av m√•let. Det siste han gjorde var √• felle Ilcic, men i mellomtiden var det Atalanta som hadde hatt best spill og flere sjanser.

Slik er Ada Hegerberg blitt tidenes mestscorende i Champions League

Sceneskiftet fra f√∏rste omgang var totalt, men det ble med det ene poenget for Atalanta, som iallfall fikk sitt f√∏rste mesterligapoeng. I samme gruppe ble det 3-3 mellom DInamo Zagreb og Sjakhtar Donetsk.
text:
Keeper Chaos for City: Had to use the player in goal
Dramatic when Manchester City got one point in the Champions League game against Atalanta.
06 Nov 2019, 21:57 by Lars S√∏rnes

Atalanta - Manchester City 1-1 (0-1)

That is not the result we are talking about after Wednesday's settlement. Manchester City had to play the final minutes with Kyle Walker between the bars.

- Kyle Walker has to be the world's fastest keeper. He kept the cage clean, said TV 2 broadcaster Jon Hartvig B√∏rrestad after the game.


Real Madrid's big talent (18) ravaged - historically became the bracket owner


Facts: Men's Champions League Wednesday, Group Round 4:


Group A:


Paris Saint-Germain (France) - Bruges (Belgium) 1-0 (1-0), Real Madrid (Spain) - Galatasaray (Turkey) 6-0 (4-0).


Group B:


Bayern Munich (Germany) - Olympiakos (Greece) 2-0 (1-0), Red Star (Serbia) - Tottenham (England) 0-4 (0-1).


Group C:


Atalanta (Italy) - Manchester C. (England) 1-1 (0-1), Dinamo Zagreb (Croatia) - Shakhtar Donetsk (Ukraine) 3-3 (1-1).


Group D:


Locomotive Moscow (Russia) - Juventus (Italy) 1-2 (1-1), Leverkusen (Germany) - Atl√©tico Madrid (Spain) 2-1 (1-0).

The replacement was expelled
Let's start a little earlier. First caretaker Ederson had to deal with what looked like an injury. Claudio Bravo came in for the light blue after the break.
Ten minutes before the end of the game, the replacement was expelled. Bravo fielded Atalanta's Josip Ilicic who was traveling alone through. After a VAR check, the referee brought out the red card.
Manager Pep Guardiola threw in Kyle Walker in the final minutes. The usually solid right back, who in this match sat on the substitute bench, ended the game in goal with the keeper gloves on.
Walker saved the free kick that occurred after the expulsion, but was otherwise not put on the big trials.

- If I volunteered? It was both and. I throw my lip at the keepers on training sometimes, but I found that it is not as easy as it looks, Walker said according to the BBC.

It was added seven minutes after nearly as much disappeared in connection with the expulsion, but the home team failed to take advantage of the overtime.
TV 2's football expert, Erik Thorstvedt, summed up Walker's efforts with a humorous analysis in the studio after the draw.
- He covers every part of the keeper's game. He finds something new and takes care of the traditional, Thorstvedt said.

Star tip up in the back at Haaland after a new scoring



Kyle Walker kept the cage clean for hectic end minutes.üì∑ Luca Bruno / AP

superior
At 1-1, Pep Guardiola's men are still not confident of advancement from the group play, although they have five points hatch on the table top with two rounds remaining. With victory at San Siro on Wednesday, City would already have been the group winner, and at the break everything indicated what would be three points.
The Bergamo team Atalanta, who in their first Champions League participation has to play the home matches in Milan, were scoreless after the first three matches and were played by City in the first round at times.
There was a class difference when the team took the lead in the 7th minute. Raheem Sterling played for Bernardo Silva, who found Gabriel Jesus running on the field. He then kicked the ball to Sterling, who could score from short range. The home defense was totally played out.

Downfall for Arsenal - victory was lost in overtime

The Premier League champion seemed superior in the first half and constantly threatened to score more goals. It should have been 2-0 a few minutes before the break, but Gabriel Jesus sent a penalty kick weakly to the side.


Walker held the zero for City.üì∑ CARL RECINE / Reuters


Barcelona stumbled into the Champions League

VAR-drama
First penalty was sentenced when Rafael Toloi retained Sterling on his way into the field, but VAR intervened and determined that the offense was outside the 16 meter. Sterling took the free kick, which hit Josip Ilcic's hand in the wall. After the judge was out at the VAR screen, the penalty was punished, but Jesus wasted it.
49 minutes into the match, the visitors put themselves ahead 2 - 4 as Alejandro G√≥mez finished off an attack from the left with a spectacular scissors kick. He flicked the ball into the box and there was a totally lonely Mario Pasalic to the right.
Almost the first thing Claudio Bravo did in the match was to pick the ball out of goal. The last thing he did was to trap Ilcic, but in the meantime it was Atalanta who had the best games and more chances.

This is how Ada Hegerberg has become the top scorer of all time in the Champions League

The change of stage from the first place was total, but that was the one point for Atalanta, who at least got his first Champions League score. In the same group, it was 3-3 between DInamo Zagreb and Shakhtar Donetsk.
